question: The US has recently rejected China and Russiaâ€™s call to ease sanctions on North Korea. Which country supported North Korea during the Korean War?
explanation: Korean War (1950-53) took place when North Korean military invaded South Korea. The UN force led by the US intervened to defend the south and rapidly advanced into North Korea. Chinese forces intervened on behalf of North Korea. No peace treaty was signed but an armistice in 1953 led to the restoration of the original boundary of the two nations.
